name: Digital Logic Sim
description:
A minimalistic digital logic simulator. You start with an AND and a NOT gate, and from there you can build whatever you want.

I created this as a visualisation tool for my video series on the basics of how computers work, but have released it since a number of people were interested in trying it. May be buggy, and definitely lacking in many features! For something far more complete, take a look at logism.

Source code available here: https://github.com/SebLague/Digital-Logic-Sim
